Actions.Name: Formation
Actions.Description: Shove all allies in range 2 1 space towards this character.

Actions.Name: Bale
Actions.Description: The Farmer uses a pitchfork, shovel, or sheer strength and picks up an adjacent foe size 1 or smaller, removing them from the battlefield and placing them in an adjacent space, then shoving them 1.

Actions.Name: On the Chin
Actions.Description: The Farmer gains aura 1. The farmer and allies in the aura are sturdy, and the farmer gains vigilance 1 at the end of their turn.
